actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Phyllis Steiner.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to a named individual a reasonable sum for travel to and from Arlington National Cemetery. Provides that such payment shall be in full settlement of all claims against the United States arising from the wrongful death of said individual's son. Directs the Secretary of the Navy to dispatch an expedition to the grave site of the decedent for purposes of transporting the remains to Arlington National Cemetery for burial.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Phyllis Steiner.
